caption:
SACRED SOAK⁠
Minimalism meets the mountains at Desert Reef Hot Springs, an otherworldly escape in Florence, Colorado, where our model channels serenity, strength, and sundrenched style.⁠
⁠
STAY AWHILE⁠
Colorado’s high country calls to adventurers—but the luxe hotels and resorts we’re profiling in this issue make a strong case for staying put. These mountain hotels aren’t just places to sleep; they’re destinations in their own right, marrying rugged alpine backdrops with hot tubs, haute design, and the kind of hospitality that dares you to cancel your plans—and maybe your return trip home.⁠
⁠
Pick up the June 2025 Staycation Issue at local newsstands or download the digital magazine at the link in bio.⁠
